channel.title: Brentwood Baptist Video Podcast
channel.description: This podcast contains video of messages presented by Senior Pastor Mike Glenn and guest speakers during Sunday morning worship services at Brentwood Baptist Church in Brentwood, TN.
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast contains video of messages presented by Senior Pastor Mike Glenn and guest speakers during Sunday morning worship services at Brentwood Baptist Church in Brentwood, TN.
